content:
<rule id="integration-00006" xmlns="http://windup.jboss.org/schema/jboss-ruleset">
          <when>
              <file filename="{*}apiman{*}.jar"/>
          </when>
          <perform>
              <classification category-id="information" effort="0" title="Embedded framework - Apiman">
                  <description>The application embeds an Apiman library.</description>
              </classification>
              <technology-tag level="INFORMATIONAL">Apiman</technology-tag>
          </perform>
      </rule>
